Swamp tar is a thick substance found in the Lumbridge and Mort Myre swamps.

Swamp tar is required for crafting swamp paste for various repairing purposes. It can be distilled into lamp oil, which is used as fuel for various light sources, or be used to make guam, marrentill, tarromin, and harralander tar, which are used as bait and ammunition for salamanders.

Contents

  • 1 Uses
    • 1.1 Swamp paste
    • 1.2 Herb tar
    • 1.3 Lamp oil
    • 1.4 Quests
  • 2 Products
  • 3 Item sources
    • 3.1 Spawns
  • 4 Changes

Uses[edit | edit source]

Swamp paste[edit | edit source]

It can be combined with flour to produce raw swamp paste, and then heated on a fire to create swamp paste. Swamp paste is a sticky item used in the Sea Slug quest as well as the Shades of Mort'ton and Fishing Trawler minigames.

Herb tar[edit | edit source]

When combined with a Guam, marrentill, tarromin or harralander, swamp tar becomes a tar used in the Hunter skill as bait ingredient while catching salamanders. This paste also doubles as ammunition for the salamanders when used as a weapon. 1 herb is needed for every 15 swamp tar.

The action of creating the herb tar can be used in tick manipulation, allowing you to do certain actions faster.

Lamp oil[edit | edit source]

Swamp tar can be processed at the home of the Chemist or at Miltog's Lamps (in Dorgesh-Kaan) to turn empty lanterns into filled lanterns so that they may be lit.

Quests[edit | edit source]

Swamp tar is involved with several quests.

  • Cold War
  • Eagles' Peak
  • Forgettable Tale... (possibly)
  • Horror from the Deep
  • Lunar Diplomacy
  • Shades of Mort'ton
  • Troll Romance
  • Tears of Guthix
  • Sea Slug

[[File:Swamp tar detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Swamp tar''' is a thick substance found in the [[Lumbridge Swamp|Lumbridge]] and [[Mort Myre Swamp|Mort Myre swamps]]. 

Swamp tar is required for crafting [[swamp paste]] for various repairing purposes. It can be distilled into [[lamp oil]], which is used as fuel for various [[light source]]s, or be used to make [[guam tar|guam]], [[marrentill tar|marrentill]], [[tarromin tar|tarromin]], and [[harralander tar]], which are used as bait and ammunition for [[salamander]]s.

==Uses==
===Swamp paste===
It can be combined with [[flour]] to produce [[raw swamp paste]], and then heated on a fire to create [[swamp paste]]. Swamp paste is a sticky item used in the [[Sea Slug]] quest as well as the [[Shades of Mort'ton (minigame)|Shades of Mort'ton]] and [[Fishing Trawler]] minigames.

===Herb tar===
When combined with a [[Guam]], [[marrentill]], [[tarromin]] or [[harralander]], swamp tar becomes a tar used in the [[Hunter]] skill as bait ingredient while catching [[salamander]]s. This paste also doubles as ammunition for the salamanders when used as a weapon. 1 herb is needed for every 15 swamp tar.

The action of creating the herb tar can be used in [[tick manipulation]], allowing you to do certain actions faster.

===Lamp oil===
Swamp tar can be processed at the home of the [[Chemist]] or at [[Miltog's Lamps]] (in [[Dorgesh-Kaan]]) to turn empty lanterns into filled lanterns so that they may be lit.

===Quests===
Swamp tar is involved with several quests.
*[[Cold War]]
*[[Eagles' Peak]]
*[[Forgettable Tale...]] (possibly)
*[[Horror from the Deep]]
*[[Lunar Diplomacy]]
*[[Shades of Mort'ton]]
*[[Troll Romance]]
*[[Tears of Guthix]]
*[[Sea Slug]]
